usageHint.openFiles: open the files you want to rename

fileRename.noOutputDir: none (leave the files where they are)

error.createDir: Output directory could not be created: {{error}}

fileNameTemplate.title: File name template (<0/>).
fileNameTemplate.errorInvalidTemplate: The template has to contain <0>{season_no}</0> and <1>{episode_no}</1>, because file names have to be unique!

defaultOutputDir.title: Default output directory.
defaultOutputDir.hint: You can use <0>{show_name}</0> to dynamically include the name of the tv show.

includedFileTypes.title: Included file types.
includedFileTypes.hint: These file extensions will be included when opening files (separate with comma).

excludedTerms.title: Excluded terms.
excludedTerms.hint: Exclude files that contain one of these terms in their name or path (separate with comma).
